resources.string: This is the jadex-android demo application. Choose a demo to run.

This Activity demonstrates the usage of messages and "events", which allow simple communication between agent and activity. If you press the button below, a message is sent to the agent and then an event is thrown back to the activity.
This Activity demonstrates the usage of BPMN-Workflows in Jadex-Android. Please wait until the platform is started.
This Activity demonstrates the usage of BDI Agents in Jadex-Android. Please wait until the platform is started.
This Activity uses a Jadex Component to encapsulate a call to the Google Chart REST API.
